name: Runastie
description:
Player embodies a mighty fallen mage who finds himself trapped in a deep dungeon and who will have to find a way out.

Teams :

ZAFFRAN Arthur - Level Design/ Level Building 

MORAND  Florian - Level Building / Game Design 

POCHARD Loïc (https://elpochet.itch.io/) - Programmer / Game Design 

DELORME Adrien (Me) - Programmer / Game Design
